task.title: Map test cases between and Rally

taskbody.context: provides an easy way to map a Katalon test case to an existing Rally test case. Follow these steps:

step.cmd: To retrieve the test case ID, open your project in Rally, then go to Quality > Test Cases. Here you can see the list of test cases and their IDs.
In , open the test case you wish to link to Rally. Switch to the Integration tab, and specify the respective test case ID in Rally.

image.alt: Map Rally and Studio test cases

taskbody.result: You have successfully mapped test cases between and Rally.
